alert.note: Alert for Maryland Beaches (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 21 at 1:01PM EST until December 23 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT THURSDAY NIGHT TO 6 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 6 to 8 feet expected in the surf zone. * WHERE...In Maryland, coastal Worcester County. In Virginia, Accomack County. * WHEN...From midnight Thursday night to 6 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour.
